name: Anita Mahfood
description: '''Anita "Margarita" Mahfood''' (died 2 January 1965) was a dancer, actress, and singer in [[Jamaica]]. She was called "the famous Rhumba queen" and headlined performances. She also performed [[reggae]] music, writing and singing her own music, one of the first women in Jamaica to do so. Mahfood was murdered in 1965, by her boyfriend [[Don Drummond]] of the [[Skatalites]] band.
